content.title: Label and protect activity

content.query:
let minTime = toscalar(InformationProtectionEvents | where isnotempty(MachineName) | summarize min(Time));
let dates = range ["date"] from bin(minTime, {TimeRange:grain}) to now() step {TimeRange:grain};
InformationProtectionEvents
| where isnotempty(MachineName)
| summarize users=dcount(User), devices = dcount(MachineName) by bin(Time, {TimeRange:grain})
| join kind= rightouter
(
    dates
)
on $left.Time == $right.["date"]
| project ["date"], users = coalesce(users, 0), devices = coalesce(devices, 0)
content.title: Users and devices

content.query:
InformationProtectionEvents
| where isnotempty(LabelId)
| where isnotempty(ItemPath)
| where Activity in ("NewLabel", "UpgradeLabel", "DowngradeLabel", "RemoveProtection", "NewProtection", "ChangeProtection")
| summarize value=count() by LabelName
| order by value
content.title: Labels

content.query:
InformationProtectionEvents
| where isnotempty(LabelId)
| where isnotempty(ItemPath)
| where Activity in ("NewLabel", "UpgradeLabel", "DowngradeLabel", "RemoveProtection", "NewProtection", "ChangeProtection")
| summarize value=count() by ApplicationName
| order by value
content.title: Labels by application
